### [Parks Department](http://3jt.ccd.myftpupload.com/?page_id=2629)

With the recent development of a privately owned industrial park that has all the infrastructure needs for any business, the City of Primera is poised to encourage economic development in the area. The industrial park anchored by Alamo Doors has industrial sites of various sizes to offer potential business. Through its economic development component, the City of Primera Economic Development Corporation, and the EDC’s 4a & 4b funds, the city can offer businesses access to incentives for job creation and development in Pirmera.
